verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came again unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,
<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, there were <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H802>women<s%>, the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H517>mother<s%>:

And they committed <S%H2181>whoredoms<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; they committed <S%H2181>whoredoms<s%> in their <S%H5271>youth<s%>: there were their <S%H7699>breasts<s%> <S%H4600>pressed<s%>, and there they <S%H6213>bruised<s%> the <S%H1717>teats<s%> of their <S%H1331>virginity<s%>.

And the <S%H8034>names<s%> of them were <S%H170>Aholah<s%> the <S%H1419>elder<s%>, and <S%H172>Aholibah<s%> her <S%H269>sister<s%>: and they were <S%H3205>mine<s%>, and they bore <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters<s%>. Thus were their <S%H8034>names<s%>; <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> is <S%H170>Aholah<s%>, and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H172>Aholibah<s%>.

And <S%H170>Aholah<s%> played the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> when she was <S%H8478>mine<s%>; and she <S%H5689>doted<s%> on her <S%H157>lovers<s%>, on the <S%H804>Assyrians<s%> her <S%H7138>neighbors<s%>,

Which were <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H8504>blue<s%>, <S%H6346>captains<s%> and <S%H5461>rulers<s%>, all of them <S%H2531>desirable<s%> young <S%H970>men<s%>, <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> <S%H7392>riding<s%> upon <S%H5483>horses<s%>.

Thus she <S%H5414>committed<s%> her <S%H8457>whoredoms<s%> with <S%H4005>them<s%>, with all them that were the chosen <S%H1121>men<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>, and with all on whom she <S%H5689>doted<s%>: with all their <S%H1544>idols<s%> she defiled <S%H2930>herself<s%>.

Neither <S%H5800>left<s%> she her <S%H8457>whoredoms<s%> brought from <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: for in her <S%H5271>youth<s%> they <S%H7901>lay<s%> with <S%H6213>her<s%>, and they bruised the <S%H1717>breasts<s%> of her <S%H1331>virginity<s%>, and <S%H8210>poured<s%> their whoredom upon <S%H8457>her<s%>.
Therefore I have <S%H5414>delivered<s%> her into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of her <S%H157>lovers<s%>, into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1121>Assyrians<s%>, upon whom she <S%H5689>doted<s%>.

These <S%H1540>discovered<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>: they <S%H3947>took<s%> her <S%H1121>sons<s%> and her <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, and <S%H2026>killed<s%> her with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>: and she became <S%H8034>famous<s%> among <S%H802>women<s%>; for they had <S%H6213>executed<s%> judgment upon <S%H8196>her<s%>.

And when her <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H172>Aholibah<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H7843>this<s%>, she was more corrupt in her inordinate <S%H5691>love<s%> than <S%H8457>she<s%>, and in her whoredoms more than her <S%H269>sister<s%> in her <S%H2183>whoredoms<s%>.

She <S%H5689>doted<s%> upon the <S%H1121>Assyrians<s%> her <S%H7138>neighbors<s%>, <S%H6346>captains<s%> and <S%H5461>rulers<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> most <S%H4358>gorgeously<s%>, <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> <S%H7392>riding<s%> upon <S%H5483>horses<s%>, all of them <S%H2531>desirable<s%> young <S%H970>men<s%>.
Then I <S%H7200>saw<s%> that she was <S%H2930>defiled<s%>, that they took <S%H8147>both<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%>,

And that she <S%H3254>increased<s%> her <S%H8457>whoredoms<s%>: for when she <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H2707>portrayed<s%> upon the <S%H7023>wall<s%>, the <S%H6754>images<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> <S%H2710>portrayed<s%> with <S%H8350>vermilion<s%>,

<S%H2289>Girded<s%> with <S%H232>belts<s%> upon their <S%H4975>body<s%>, <S%H5628>exceedingly<s%> in dyed <S%H2871>attire<s%> upon their <S%H7218>heads<s%>, all of them <S%H7991>princes<s%> to look <S%H4758>to<s%>, after the <S%H1823>manner<s%> of the <S%H1121>Babylonians<s%> of <S%H3778>Chaldea<s%>, the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H4138>nativity<s%>:
And as soon as she <S%H4758>saw<s%> them with her <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, she <S%H5689>doted<s%> upon <S%H7971>them<s%>, and sent <S%H4397>messengers<s%> unto them into <S%H3778>Chaldea<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>Babylonians<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to her into the <S%H4904>bed<s%> of <S%H1730>love<s%>, and they <S%H2930>defiled<s%> her with their <S%H8457>whoredom<s%>, and she was <S%H2930>polluted<s%> with <S%H5315>them<s%>, and her mind was alienated from <S%H3363>them<s%>.

So she <S%H1540>discovered<s%> her <S%H8457>whoredoms<s%>, and <S%H1540>discovered<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>: then my <S%H5315>mind<s%> was <S%H3363>alienated<s%> from <S%H5315>her<s%>, like as my mind was <S%H5361>alienated<s%> from her <S%H269>sister<s%>.

Yet she <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> her <S%H8457>whoredoms<s%>, in calling to <S%H2142>memory<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of her <S%H5271>youth<s%>, where she had played the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

For she <S%H5689>doted<s%> upon their <S%H6370>paramours<s%>, whose <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is as the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of <S%H2543>donkeys<s%>, and whose <S%H2231>issue<s%> is like the <S%H2231>issue<s%> of <S%H5483>horses<s%>.

Thus you called to <S%H6485>memory<s%> the <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> of your <S%H5271>youth<s%>, in <S%H6213>bruising<s%> your <S%H1717>teats<s%> by the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> for the <S%H7699>breasts<s%> of your <S%H5271>youth<s%>.

<S%H172>Therefore<s%>, O Aholibah, thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; <S%H5782>Behold<s%>, I will raise up your <S%H157>lovers<s%> against <S%H5315>you<s%>, from whom your mind is <S%H5361>alienated<s%>, and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> them against you on every <S%H5439>side<s%>;

The <S%H1121>Babylonians<s%>, and all the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>, <S%H6489>Pekod<s%>, and <S%H7772>Shoa<s%>, and <S%H6970>Koa<s%>, and all the <S%H1121>Assyrians<s%> with <S%H2531>them<s%>: all of them desirable young <S%H970>men<s%>, <S%H6346>captains<s%> and <S%H5461>rulers<s%>, great <S%H7991>lords<s%> and <S%H7121>renowned<s%>, all of them <S%H7392>riding<s%> upon <S%H5483>horses<s%>.

And they shall <S%H935>come<s%> against you with <S%H2021>chariots<s%>, <S%H7393>wagons<s%>, and <S%H1534>wheels<s%>, and with a <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H5971>people<s%>, which shall <S%H7760>set<s%> against you <S%H6793>shield<s%> and <S%H4043>shield<s%> and <S%H6959>helmet<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>: and I will <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8199>them<s%>, and they shall judge you according to their <S%H4941>judgments<s%>.

And I will <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> against <S%H6213>you<s%>, and they shall deal <S%H2534>furiously<s%> with <S%H5493>you<s%>: they shall take away your <S%H639>nose<s%> and your <S%H241>ears<s%>; and your <S%H319>remnant<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>: they shall <S%H3947>take<s%> your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%>; and your <S%H319>residue<s%> shall be <S%H398>devoured<s%> by the <S%H784>fire<s%>.
They shall also <S%H6584>strip<s%> you out of your <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and take <S%H3947>away<s%> your <S%H8597>fair<s%> <S%H3627>jewels<s%>.

Thus will I make your <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%> from <S%H2184>you<s%>, and your whoredom brought from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: so that you shall not lift <S%H5375>up<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> unto <S%H2142>them<s%>, nor remember Egypt any <S%H4714>more<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; <S%H5414>Behold<s%>, I will deliver you into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of them whom you <S%H8130>hate<s%>, into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of them from whom your <S%H5315>mind<s%> is <S%H5361>alienated<s%>:

And they shall <S%H6213>deal<s%> with you <S%H8135>hatefully<s%>, and shall take <S%H3947>away<s%> all your <S%H3018>labor<s%>, and shall <S%H5800>leave<s%> you <S%H5903>naked<s%> and <S%H6181>bare<s%>: and the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your <S%H2183>whoredoms<s%> shall be <S%H1540>discovered<s%>, both your <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> and your <S%H8457>whoredoms<s%>.

I will <S%H6213>do<s%> these things unto <S%H2181>you<s%>, because you have gone a whoring <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, and because you are <S%H2930>polluted<s%> with their <S%H1544>idols<s%>.
You have <S%H1980>walked<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of your <S%H269>sister<s%>; therefore will I <S%H5414>give<s%> her <S%H3563>cup<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; You shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> of your <S%H269>sister<s%>'s <S%H3563>cup<s%> <S%H6013>deep<s%> and <S%H7342>large<s%>: you shall be laughed to <S%H6712>scorn<s%> and had in <S%H3933>derision<s%>; it <S%H3557>contains<s%> <S%H4767>much<s%>.

You shall be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H7943>drunkenness<s%> and <S%H3015>sorrow<s%>, with the <S%H3563>cup<s%> of <S%H8047>astonishment<s%> and <S%H8077>desolation<s%>, with the <S%H3563>cup<s%> of your <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>.

You shall even <S%H8354>drink<s%> it and suck it <S%H4680>out<s%>, and you shall <S%H1633>break<s%> the <S%H2789>shards<s%> <S%H5423>there<s%>, and pluck off your own <S%H7699>breasts<s%>: for I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H5002>it<s%>, says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; Because you have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> <S%H7993>me<s%>, and cast me <S%H310>behind<s%> your <S%H1458>back<s%>, therefore <S%H5375>bear<s%> you also your <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> and your <S%H8457>whoredoms<s%>.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> moreover unto <S%H1121>me<s%>; Son of <S%H120>man<s%>, will you <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H170>Aholah<s%> and <S%H172>Aholibah<s%>? <S%H5046>Yes<s%>, declare unto them their <S%H8441>abominations<s%>;

That they have committed <S%H5003>adultery<s%>, and <S%H1818>blood<s%> is in their <S%H3027>hands<s%>, and with their <S%H1544>idols<s%> have they committed <S%H5003>adultery<s%>, and have also caused their <S%H1121>sons<s%>, whom they <S%H3205>bore<s%> unto <S%H5674>me<s%>, to pass them through the <S%H402>fire<s%>, to devour them.
Moreover this they have <S%H6213>done<s%> unto <S%H2930>me<s%>: they have defiled my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> in the same <S%H3117>day<s%>, and have <S%H2490>profaned<s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%>.

For when they had <S%H7819>slain<s%> their <S%H1121>sons<s%> to their <S%H1544>idols<s%>, then they <S%H935>came<s%> the same <S%H3117>day<s%> into my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> to <S%H2490>profane<s%> <S%H6213>it<s%>; and, behold, thus have they done in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of my <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And <S%H637>furthermore<s%>, that you have <S%H7971>sent<s%> for <S%H582>men<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H4801>far<s%>, unto whom a <S%H4397>messenger<s%> was <S%H7971>sent<s%>; <S%H935>and<s%>, behold, they came: for whom you did <S%H7364>wash<s%> <S%H3583>yourself<s%>, painted your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H5710>decked<s%> yourself with <S%H5716>ornaments<s%>,

And <S%H3427>sat<s%> upon a <S%H3520>stately<s%> <S%H4296>bed<s%>, and a <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H6186>prepared<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7760>it<s%>, whereupon you have set my <S%H7004>incense<s%> and my <S%H8081>oil<s%>.

And a <S%H6963>voice<s%> of a <S%H1995>multitude<s%> being at <S%H7961>ease<s%> was with <S%H582>her<s%>: and with the men of the common <S%H7230>sort<s%> were <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H5436>Sabeans<s%> from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, which <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H6781>bracelets<s%> upon their <S%H3027>hands<s%>, and <S%H8597>beautiful<s%> <S%H5850>crowns<s%> upon their <S%H7218>heads<s%>.
Then <S%H559>said<s%> I unto her that was <S%H1087>old<s%> in <S%H5004>adulteries<s%>, Will they now <S%H2181>commit<s%> whoredoms with <S%H8457>her<s%>, and she with them?

Yet they went <S%H935>in<s%> unto <S%H935>her<s%>, as they go in unto a <S%H802>woman<s%> that plays the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%>: so went they <S%H935>in<s%> unto <S%H170>Aholah<s%> and unto <S%H172>Aholibah<s%>, the <S%H2154>lewd<s%> <S%H802>women<s%>.

And the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>, they shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> them after the <S%H4941>manner<s%> of <S%H5003>adulteresses<s%>, and after the <S%H4941>manner<s%> of women that <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>; because they are <S%H5003>adulteresses<s%>, and <S%H1818>blood<s%> is in their <S%H3027>hands<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; I will bring <S%H5927>up<s%> a <S%H6951>company<s%> upon <S%H5414>them<s%>, and will give them to be <S%H2189>removed<s%> and <S%H957>spoiled<s%>.

And the <S%H6951>company<s%> shall <S%H7275>stone<s%> them with <S%H68>stones<s%>, and <S%H1254>dispatch<s%> them with their <S%H2719>swords<s%>; they shall <S%H2026>kill<s%> their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, and burn <S%H8313>up<s%> their <S%H1004>houses<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>.

Thus will I cause <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%>, that all <S%H802>women<s%> may be <S%H3256>taught<s%> not to <S%H6213>do<s%> after your <S%H2154>lewdness<s%>.

And they shall <S%H5414>recompense<s%> your <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> upon <S%H5375>you<s%>, and you shall bear the <S%H2399>sins<s%> of your <S%H1544>idols<s%>: and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>.
